docs.title: OAE PINN Emulator
docs.text:
Physics-informed neural network emulator for tracer transport in Ocean Alkalinity Enhancement (OAE) simulations.

This site summarizes the motivation, approach, and key results from my MS thesis project.

docs.title: Code
docs.text:
Codebase: github.com/OAE-PINN-Emulator

Repo + training scripts will live here (setup + usage docs coming soon).

docs.title: Playground
docs.text: Interactive demo coming soon (run inference on a trained model + visualize rollouts).
